object.property: Template for gathering performance data via SSH commands.
Average percentage of time that CPUs were idle and the system did not have an outstanding disk I/O request.
The average percentage of time spent executing niced processes in user mode.
The average percentage of CPU time spent executing processing kernel-level code.
The average percentage of time spent executing niced processes in user mode.
The average percentage of time spent executing niced processes in user mode.
Average percentage of CPU time executing in the user mode.
CPU idle time during which the system had outstanding disk/NFS I/O request(s).
Total number of context switches across all CPUs
The sum of all interrupts. The/bin/cat /proc/stat command will also show values to the right that breakdown the causes of the interrupts
This is the value for total number of sectors read.
This is the value for total number of sectors written
This is the value of the system load averages for the past 1 minute obtained from the uptime command
This is the value of the system load averages for the past 15 minutes obtained from the uptime command
This is the value of the system load averages for the past 5 minutes obtained from the uptime command
Number of process matching process name.
Ethernet interface template with 75% utilization threshold
The received errors on the specified network interface.
The total number of octets received on the interface
The value in the Ipkts column reflects the number of packets received on the specified network interface.
The transmit errors on the specified network interface.
The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface
The number of packets sent to the specified network interface.
